java.lang.Object

org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.CompactionTool.CompactionInputFormat
Enclosing class:
CompactionTool
private static class CompactionTool.CompactionInputFormat extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.input.TextInputFormat
Input format that uses store files block location as input split locality.
